languages.text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам. Кибелла часами бродила средь зеркальных троп, с удивлением изучая чудо природы. Она поблагодарила Домин за возможность увидеть невероятные места, столь отличные от тьмы нижних палуб.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked the Domin for the opportunity to see incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.
languages.original_text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам. Кибелла часами бродила средь зеркальных троп, с удивлением изучая чудо природы. Она поблагодарила Домин за возможность увидеть невероятные места, столь отличные от тьмы нижних палуб.

traits.locale_text: The walk was peaceful and memorable for the officers. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked Enim for the opportunity to see the incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.

The walk was peaceful and memorable for the officers. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked Domin for the opportunity to see the incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked the Domin for the opportunity to see incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked the Domin for the opportunity to see incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.

languages.text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Kibellah hat Stunden damit verbracht, auf den verspiegelten Wegen zu wandern und die Wunder der Natur zu bestaunen. Sie hat dem Domin für die Gelegenheit gedankt, unglaubliche Orte zu sehen, die sich so sehr von der Dunkelheit der unteren Decks unterscheiden.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked the Domin for the opportunity to see incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.

traits.locale_text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Kibellah hat Stunden damit verbracht, auf den verspiegelten Wegen zu wandern und die Wunder der Natur zu bestaunen. Sie hat dem Domin für die Gelegenheit gedankt, unglaubliche Orte zu sehen, die sich so sehr von der Dunkelheit der unteren Decks unterscheiden.

languages.text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Kibellah a passé des heures à arpenter les sentiers jumeaux, émerveillée par les miracles de la nature et elle a remercié {mf|le|la} Domin pour cette occasion qui lui a été donnée d'admirer des lieux incroyables, à des années-lumière de l'obscurité des ponts inférieurs.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked the Domin for the opportunity to see incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.

traits.locale_text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Kibellah a passé des heures à arpenter les sentiers jumeaux, émerveillée par les miracles de la nature et elle a remercié {mf|le|la} Domin pour cette occasion qui lui a été donnée d'admirer des lieux incroyables, à des années-lumière de l'obscurité des ponts inférieurs.

languages.text: El permiso transcurre sin incidencias y los oficiales de la nave pasan varias semanas hablando de lo sucedido. Kibellah dedica horas a caminar por los caminos espejo, maravillándose ante la belleza de la naturaleza. Agradece a su Domin la oportunidad de visitar lugares tan increíbles y tan distintos a la oscuridad de las cubiertas inferiores.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked the Domin for the opportunity to see incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.

traits.locale_text: El permiso transcurre sin incidencias y los oficiales de la nave pasan varias semanas hablando de lo sucedido. Kibellah dedica horas a caminar por los caminos espejo, maravillándose ante la belleza de la naturaleza. Agradece a su Domin la oportunidad de visitar lugares tan increíbles y tan distintos a la oscuridad de las cubiertas inferiores.

languages.text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく終わり、士官たちは何週間もの間、その話題で持ちきりだった。キベラは何時間も鏡張りの道を歩き、自然の神秘に感嘆した。彼女は下層デッキの暗闇とは異なる、息をのむような場所を見る機会を与えてくれたドミンに感謝した。
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked the Domin for the opportunity to see incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.

traits.locale_text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく終わり、士官たちは何週間もの間、その話題で持ちきりだった。キベラは何時間も鏡張りの道を歩き、自然の神秘に感嘆した。彼女は下層デッキの暗闇とは異なる、息をのむような場所を見る機会を与えてくれたドミンに感謝した。

languages.text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。绮贝菈花了几个小时在错综复杂的小路上徘徊，惊叹于大自然的奇迹。她感谢秘者让她有机会离开黑暗的底层甲板，看到如此令人惊艳的美景。
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked the Domin for the opportunity to see incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.

traits.locale_text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。绮贝菈花了几个小时在错综复杂的小路上徘徊，惊叹于大自然的奇迹。她感谢秘者让她有机会离开黑暗的底层甲板，看到如此令人惊艳的美景。

languages.text: İniş sonrasında hiçbir sorun yaşanmıyor ve gemi subayları, sonrasında haftalarca buradan bahsediyor. Kibellah, yansıyan yollarda saatlerce dolaşıp doğanın bu mucizesine hayran kalıyor. Alt güvertelerin karanlığından çok farklı, inanılmaz yerler görme fırsatı sunduğu için Domin'e teşekkürlerini sunuyor.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Kibellah spent hours wandering among the mirrored paths, marvelling at the wonder of nature. She thanked the Domin for the opportunity to see incredible places so different from the darkness of the lower decks.
